message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $10000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $17000. This still leaves me some room, but I'm hoping we can find a deal that works for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $14000. Can you consider that?
